r.d: Implementation of CAPTCHAs (completely automated public Turing test to tell computers and humans apart)
r.n: + new feature: now supports setting background and line color for image CAPTCHAs (see CAPTCHA_test.php example file). Requires Image_Text >= 0.6.0beta to work. Many thanks to isnull! + bugfix: CAPTCHA drivers now also load Text/CAPTCHA.php via require_once (suggested by Philippe Jausions)
